3 # Command Status
4 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
5 
6 __all__ = [

15 
16 class ToolValidationException(Exception):
17  pass
18 
19 
20 #
21 # Base class for any tool
22 #
23 class Tool(object):
24 
25  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
26  self._functions_dict = {}
27  self._id = tool_id
28  self._name = tool_name
29  self._tools_state = tools_state
30  self.ros_command_interface = ros_command_interface
31  self._is_active = False
32  self.available_commands = []
33  self._tool_transformation = tool_transformation
34 
35  # To override
36  @staticmethod
37  def get_type():
38  raise NotImplementedError
39 
40  # To override
41  def validate_command(self, cmd):
42  raise NotImplementedError
43 
44  def __enter__(self):
45  self._is_active = True
46 
47  def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb):
48  self._is_active = False
49 
50  def is_active(self):
51  return self._is_active
52 
53  def get_id(self):
54  return self._id
55 
56  @property
57  def name(self):
58  return self._name
59 
60  @property
61  def transformation(self):
62  return self._tool_transformation
63 
64  def set_available_commands(self, cmd_list):
65  self.available_commands = cmd_list
66 
67  def get_available_commands(self):
68  return self.available_commands
69 
70  def __call__(self, function_name, *args):
71  return self._functions_dict[function_name](*args)
72 
73  def __str__(self):
74  return "Tool {} of type {} with ID {}".format(self._name, self.get_type(), self._id)
75 
76  def __repr__(self):
77  return self.__str__()
78 
79  def remap(self, value, old_min, old_max, new_min, new_max):
80  """Remap given value from an old range to a new range
81  """
82  return new_min + (new_max - new_min) * ((value - old_min) / (old_max - old_min))
83 
84 
85 class NoTool(Tool):
86 
87  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
88  super(NoTool, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
89 
90  @staticmethod
91  def get_type():
92  return "no_tool"
93 
94  def validate_command(self, cmd):
95  pass
96 
97  def is_connected(self):
98  state, id_ = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool()
99  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK and id_ == self._id

101 
102 class Gripper(Tool):
103 
104  def __init__(self,
105  tool_id,
106  tool_name,
107  tool_transformation,
108  tools_state,
109  ros_command_interface,
110  specs,
111  hardware_version):
112  super(Gripper, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
113  self.hardware_version = hardware_version
114 
115  self.open_position = specs.get("open_position")
116  self.open_hold_torque = specs.get("open_hold_torque")
117  self.open_max_torque = specs.get("open_max_torque")
118  self.close_position = specs.get("close_position")
119  self.close_hold_torque = specs.get("close_hold_torque")
120  self.close_max_torque = specs.get("close_max_torque")
121 
122  self.open_speed_limits = specs.get("limit_open_speed", {'min': 0, 'max': 1000})
123  self.close_speed_limits = specs.get("limit_close_speed", {'min': 0, 'max': 1000})
124  self.torque_limits = specs.get("torque_limit", {'min': -1000, 'max': 1000})
125 
126  self._functions_dict = {
127  "open_gripper": self.open_gripper,
128  "close_gripper": self.close_gripper,
129  }
130 
131  @staticmethod
132  def get_type():
133  return "gripper"
134 
135  def validate_command(self, cmd):
136  if not self.open_speed_limits["min"] <= cmd.speed < self.open_speed_limits["max"]:
137  raise ToolValidationException("Gripper open speed must be in ( {}, {})".format(
138  self.open_speed_limits["min"], self.open_speed_limits["max"]))
139  elif not self.close_speed_limits["min"] <= cmd.speed < self.close_speed_limits["max"]:
140  raise ToolValidationException("Gripper close speed must be in ( {}, {})".format(
141  self.close_speed_limits["min"], self.close_speed_limits["max"]))
142 
143  def is_connected(self):
144  state, id_ = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool()
145  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK and id_ == self._id
146 
147  def return_gripper_status(self, state):
148  if state == self._tools_state.GRIPPER_OPEN:
149  return True, "Successfully opened gripper"
150  if state == self._tools_state.GRIPPER_CLOSE:
151  return True, "Successfully closed gripper"
152  if state == self._tools_state.PING_OK:
153  return True, "Gripper is connected"
154  if state == self._tools_state.PING_ERROR:
155  return False, "Gripper not detected"
156  if state == self._tools_state.TIMEOUT:
157  return False, "Gripper action - Timeout"
158  if state == self._tools_state.WRONG_ID:
159  return False, "This gripper is not the one attached"
160  if state == self._tools_state.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM:
161  return False, "A communication problem occured, please retry"
162 
163  def open_gripper(self, cmd):
164  # Remap percentage to real torque value
165  max_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.max_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["max"]))
166  hold_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.hold_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["max"]))
167 
168  state = self.ros_command_interface.open_gripper(self._id,
169  self.open_position,
170  cmd.speed,
171  hold_torque,
172  max_torque)
173  return self.return_gripper_status(state)
174 
175  def close_gripper(self, cmd):
176  # Remap percentage to real torque value
177  max_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.max_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["min"]))
178  hold_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.hold_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["min"]))
179 
180  state = self.ros_command_interface.close_gripper(self._id,
181  self.close_position,
182  cmd.speed,
183  hold_torque,
184  max_torque)
185  return self.return_gripper_status(state)
186 
187  def update_params(self,
188  open_position,
189  open_hold_torque,
190  open_max_torque,
191  close_position,
192  close_hold_torque,
193  close_max_torque):
194  self.open_position = open_position
195  self.open_hold_torque = open_hold_torque
196  self.open_max_torque = open_max_torque
197  self.close_position = close_position
198  self.close_hold_torque = close_hold_torque
199  self.close_max_torque = close_max_torque
200 
201 
202 class Electromagnet(Tool):
203 
204  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
205  super(Electromagnet, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
206  self._functions_dict = {
207  "setup_digital_io": self.setup_digital_io,
208  "activate_digital_io": self.activate_digital_io,
209  "deactivate_digital_io": self.deactivate_digital_io,
210  }
211  self._gpio = None
212 
213  @staticmethod
214  def get_type():
215  return "electromagnet"
216 
217  def validate_command(self, cmd):
218  if type(cmd.activate) is not bool:
219  raise ToolValidationException("Electromagnet activation command should be boolean")
220 
221  def setup_digital_io(self, cmd):
222  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
223  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_setup(self._gpio)
224  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
225  return True, 'Successfully setup digital output PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio) + ' for electromagnet'
226  else:
227  return False, message
228 
229  def activate_digital_io(self, cmd):
230  if cmd.gpio != "":
231  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
232  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_activate(self._gpio, True)
233  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
234  return True, 'Successfully activated eletromagnet on PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio)
235  else:
236  return False, message
237 
238  def deactivate_digital_io(self, cmd):
239  if cmd.gpio != "":
240  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
241  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_activate(self._gpio, False)
242  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
243  return True, 'Successfully deactivated eletromagnet on PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio)
244  else:
245  return False, message
246 
247 
248 class VacuumPump(Tool):
249 
250  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface, specs):
251  super(VacuumPump, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
252  self.__pull_air_position = specs["pull_air_position"]
253  self.__pull_air_max_torque = specs["pull_air_max_torque"]
254  self.__pull_air_hold_torque = specs["pull_air_hold_torque"]
255  self.__push_air_position = specs["push_air_position"]
256  self.__push_air_max_torque = specs["push_air_max_torque"]
257 
258  self.__pull_air_velocity = specs.get("pull_air_velocity", 0)
259  self.__push_air_velocity = specs.get("push_air_velocity", 0)
260 
261  self.__torque_limits = specs.get("torque_limit", [0, 1000])
262 
263  self._functions_dict = {
264  "pull_air_vacuum_pump": self.pull_air_vacuum_pump,
265  "push_air_vacuum_pump": self.push_air_vacuum_pump,
266  }
267 
268  @staticmethod
269  def get_type():
270  return "vacuum_pump"
271 
272  def validate_command(self, cmd):
273  if type(cmd.activate) is not bool:
274  raise ToolValidationException("Vacuum Pump activation command should be boolean")
275 
276  def is_connected(self):
277  state = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool(self._id, self._name)
278  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK
279 
280  def return_vaccump_pump_state(self, state):
281  if state == self._tools_state.VACUUM_PUMP_PULLED:
282  return True, 'Successfully pulled air'
283  elif state == self._tools_state.VACUUM_PUMP_PUSHED:
284  return True, 'Successfully pushed air'
285  elif state == self._tools_state.PING_OK:
286  return True, 'Vacuum Pump is connected'
287  elif state == self._tools_state.PING_ERROR:
288  return False, 'Vacuum pump not detected'
289  elif state == self._tools_state.TIMEOUT:
290  return False, 'Vacump pump action - Timeout'
291  elif state == self._tools_state.WRONG_ID:
292  return False, 'This vacuum pump is not the one attached'
293  elif state == self._tools_state.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM:
294  return False, "A communication problem occured, please retry"
295  else:
296  return False, "Error : Unknown vacuum pump return" + str(state)
297 
298  def pull_air_vacuum_pump(self, _):
299  state = self.ros_command_interface.pull_air_vacuum_pump(self._id,
300  self.__pull_air_velocity,
301  self.__pull_air_position,
302  self.__pull_air_max_torque,
303  self.__pull_air_hold_torque)
304  return self.return_vaccump_pump_state(state)
305 
306  def push_air_vacuum_pump(self, _):
307  state = self.ros_command_interface.push_air_vacuum_pump(self._id,
308  self.__push_air_velocity,
309  self.__push_air_position,
310  self.__push_air_max_torque)
311  return self.return_vaccump_pump_state(state)
312 
313  def update_params(self,
314  pull_air_velocity,
315  pull_air_position,
316  pull_air_max_torque,
317  pull_air_hold_torque,
318  push_air_velocity,
319  push_air_position,
320  push_air_max_torque):
321  self.__pull_air_velocity = pull_air_velocity
322  self.__pull_air_position = pull_air_position
323  self.__pull_air_max_torque = pull_air_max_torque
324  self.__pull_air_hold_torque = pull_air_hold_torque
325  self.__push_air_velocity = push_air_velocity
326  self.__push_air_position = push_air_position
327  self.__push_air_max_torque = push_air_max_torque
